added.title: 📊 Document Count Display
added.content: Now displays the total number of documents directly within the dashboard.
added.raw: • 📊 Document Count Display: Now displays the total number of documents directly within the dashboard.

added.title: 🚀 Ollama Embed API Endpoint
added.raw: • 🚀 Ollama Embed API Endpoint: Enabled /api/embed endpoint proxy support.

fixed.title: 🐳 Docker Launch Issue
fixed.content: Resolved the problem preventing Open-WebUI from launching correctly when using Docker.
fixed.raw: • 🐳 Docker Launch Issue: Resolved the problem preventing Open-WebUI from launching correctly when using Docker.

changed.title: 🔍 Enhanced Search Prompts
changed.content: Improved the search query generation prompts for better accuracy and user interaction, enhancing the overall search experience.
changed.raw: • 🔍 Enhanced Search Prompts: Improved the search query generation prompts for better accuracy and user interaction, enhancing the overall search experience.

added.title: 🌐 Translation Update
added.content: Updated Catalan translations to improve user experience for Catalan speakers.
added.raw: • 🌐 Translation Update: Updated Catalan translations to improve user experience for Catalan speakers.

fixed.title: 📄 PDF Download
fixed.content: Resolved a configuration issue with fonts directory, ensuring PDFs are now downloaded with the correct formatting.
fixed.raw: • 📄 PDF Download: Resolved a configuration issue with fonts directory, ensuring PDFs are now downloaded with the correct formatting.

fixed.title: 🛠️ Installation of Tools & Functions Requirements
fixed.content: Fixed a bug where necessary requirements for tools and functions were not properly installing.
fixed.raw: • 🛠️ Installation of Tools & Functions Requirements: Fixed a bug where necessary requirements for tools and functions were not properly installing.

fixed.title: 🔗 Inline Image Link Rendering
fixed.content: Enabled rendering of images directly from links in chat.
fixed.raw: • 🔗 Inline Image Link Rendering: Enabled rendering of images directly from links in chat.

fixed.title: 📞 Post-Call User Interface Cleanup
fixed.content: Adjusted UI behavior to automatically close chat controls after a voice call ends, reducing screen clutter.
fixed.raw: • 📞 Post-Call User Interface Cleanup: Adjusted UI behavior to automatically close chat controls after a voice call ends, reducing screen clutter.

fixed.title: 🎙️ Microphone Deactivation Post-Call
fixed.content: Addressed an issue where the microphone remained active after calls.
fixed.raw: • 🎙️ Microphone Deactivation Post-Call: Addressed an issue where the microphone remained active after calls.

fixed.title: ✍️ Markdown Spacing Correction
fixed.content: Corrected spacing in Markdown rendering, ensuring text appears neatly and as expected.
fixed.raw: • ✍️ Markdown Spacing Correction: Corrected spacing in Markdown rendering, ensuring text appears neatly and as expected.

fixed.title: 🔄 Message Re-rendering
fixed.content: Fixed an issue causing all response messages to re-render with each new message, now improving chat performance.
fixed.raw: • 🔄 Message Re-rendering: Fixed an issue causing all response messages to re-render with each new message, now improving chat performance.

changed.title: 🌐 Refined Web Search Integration
changed.content: Deprecated the Search Query Generation Prompt threshold; introduced a toggle button for "Enable Web Search Query Generation" allowing users to opt-in to using web search more judiciously.
changed.raw: • 🌐 Refined Web Search Integration: Deprecated the Search Query Generation Prompt threshold; introduced a toggle button for "Enable Web Search Query Generation" allowing users to opt-in to using web search more judiciously.

changed.title: 📝 Default Prompt Templates Update
changed.content: Emptied environment variable templates for search and title generation now default to the Open WebUI default prompt templates, simplifying configuration efforts.
changed.raw: • 📝 Default Prompt Templates Update: Emptied environment variable templates for search and title generation now default to the Open WebUI default prompt templates, simplifying configuration efforts.

fixed.title: 📂 DATA_DIR Overriding
fixed.content: Fixed an issue to avoid overriding DATA_DIR, preventing errors when directories are set identically, ensuring smoother operation and data management.
fixed.raw: • 📂 DATA_DIR Overriding: Fixed an issue to avoid overriding DATA_DIR, preventing errors when directories are set identically, ensuring smoother operation and data management.

fixed.title: 🛠️ Frontmatter Extraction
fixed.content: Fixed the extraction process for frontmatter in tools and functions.
fixed.raw: • 🛠️ Frontmatter Extraction: Fixed the extraction process for frontmatter in tools and functions.

changed.title: 🎨 UI Styling
changed.content: Refined the user interface styling for enhanced visual coherence and user experience.
changed.raw: • 🎨 UI Styling: Refined the user interface styling for enhanced visual coherence and user experience.

added.title: 🛠️ Direct Database Execution for Tools & Functions
added.content: Enhanced the execution of Python files for tools and functions, now directly loading from the database for a more streamlined backend process.
added.raw: • 🛠️ Direct Database Execution for Tools & Functions: Enhanced the execution of Python files for tools and functions, now directly loading from the database for a more streamlined backend process.

fixed.title: 🔄 Automatic Rewrite of Import Statements in Tools & Functions
fixed.content: Tool and function scripts that import 'utils', 'apps', 'main', 'config' will now automatically rename these with 'open_webui.', ensuring compatibility and consistency across different modules.
fixed.raw: • 🔄 Automatic Rewrite of Import Statements in Tools & Functions: Tool and function scripts that import 'utils', 'apps', 'main', 'config' will now automatically rename these with 'open_webui.', ensuring compatibility and consistency across different modules.

fixed.title: 🎨 Styling Adjustments
fixed.content: Minor fixes in the visual styling to improve user experience and interface consistency.
fixed.raw: • 🎨 Styling Adjustments: Minor fixes in the visual styling to improve user experience and interface consistency.

added.title: 🔄 Import/Export Configuration
added.content: Users can now import and export webui configurations from admin settings > Database, simplifying setup replication across systems.
added.raw: • 🔄 Import/Export Configuration: Users can now import and export webui configurations from admin settings > Database, simplifying setup replication across systems.

added.title: 🌍 Web Search via URL Parameter
added.content: Added support for activating web search directly through URL by setting 'web-search=true'.
added.raw: • 🌍 Web Search via URL Parameter: Added support for activating web search directly through URL by setting 'web-search=true'.

added.title: 🌐 SearchApi Integration
added.content: Added support for SearchApi as an alternative web search provider, enhancing search capabilities within the platform.
added.raw: • 🌐 SearchApi Integration: Added support for SearchApi as an alternative web search provider, enhancing search capabilities within the platform.

added.title: 🔍 Literal Type Support in Tools
added.content: Tools now support the Literal type.
added.raw: • 🔍 Literal Type Support in Tools: Tools now support the Literal type.

added.title: 🌍 Updated Translations
added.content: Improved translations for Chinese, Ukrainian, and Catalan.
added.raw: • 🌍 Updated Translations: Improved translations for Chinese, Ukrainian, and Catalan.

fixed.title: 🔧 Pip Install Issue
fixed.content: Resolved the issue where pip install failed due to missing 'alembic.ini', ensuring smoother installation processes.
fixed.raw: • 🔧 Pip Install Issue: Resolved the issue where pip install failed due to missing 'alembic.ini', ensuring smoother installation processes.

fixed.title: 🌃 Automatic Theme Update
fixed.content: Fixed an issue where the color theme did not update dynamically with system changes.
fixed.raw: • 🌃 Automatic Theme Update: Fixed an issue where the color theme did not update dynamically with system changes.

fixed.title: 🛠️ User Agent in ComfyUI
fixed.content: Added default headers in ComfyUI to fix access issues, improving reliability in network communications.
fixed.raw: • 🛠️ User Agent in ComfyUI: Added default headers in ComfyUI to fix access issues, improving reliability in network communications.

fixed.title: 🔄 Missing Chat Completion Response Headers
fixed.content: Ensured proper return of proxied response headers during chat completion, improving API reliability.
fixed.raw: • 🔄 Missing Chat Completion Response Headers: Ensured proper return of proxied response headers during chat completion, improving API reliability.

fixed.title: 🔗 Websocket Connection Prioritization
fixed.content: Modified socket.io configuration to prefer websockets and more reliably fallback to polling, enhancing connection stability.
fixed.raw: • 🔗 Websocket Connection Prioritization: Modified socket.io configuration to prefer websockets and more reliably fallback to polling, enhancing connection stability.

fixed.title: 🎭 Accessibility Enhancements
fixed.content: Added missing ARIA labels for buttons, improving accessibility for visually impaired users.
fixed.raw: • 🎭 Accessibility Enhancements: Added missing ARIA labels for buttons, improving accessibility for visually impaired users.

fixed.title: ⚖️ Advanced Parameter
fixed.content: Fixed an issue ensuring that advanced parameters are correctly applied in all scenarios, ensuring consistent behavior of user-defined settings.
fixed.raw: • ⚖️ Advanced Parameter: Fixed an issue ensuring that advanced parameters are correctly applied in all scenarios, ensuring consistent behavior of user-defined settings.

changed.title: 🔁 Namespace Reorganization
changed.content: Reorganized all Python files under the 'open_webui' namespace to streamline the project structure and improve maintainability. Tools and functions importing from 'utils' should now use 'open_webui.utils'.
changed.raw: • 🔁 Namespace Reorganization: Reorganized all Python files under the 'open_webui' namespace to streamline the project structure and improve maintainability. Tools and functions importing from 'utils' should now use 'open_webui.utils'.

changed.title: 🚧 Dependency Updates
changed.content: Updated several backend dependencies like 'aiohttp', 'authlib', 'duckduckgo-search', 'flask-cors', and 'langchain' to their latest versions, enhancing performance and security.
changed.raw: • 🚧 Dependency Updates: Updated several backend dependencies like 'aiohttp', 'authlib', 'duckduckgo-search', 'flask-cors', and 'langchain' to their latest versions, enhancing performance and security.
